# Near-duplicate allowlist
# Generated files and legitimate duplicates are listed here
# Format: file1 <-> file2

# Generated protobuf files (if any)
# proto/*/v1/*_pb2.py <-> proto/*/v1/*_pb2.py

# Template files that need to remain similar
# services/ptaas/web/src/components/ui/* <-> services/ptaas/web/src/components/ui/*

# Configuration templates (allowlisted patterns)
# configs/docker/* <-> configs/k8s/*
